name: DodgeBrawl
description:
DodgeBrawl is a 2-4 multiplayer, top down, arena based sports game, where  players must battle it out to become the last one standing. Loosely based on the sport of dodgeball, players find themselves in questionable locations where they REALLY shouldn't be playing sports. Maps include a Graveyard and a busy Downtown Street.  Each arena has interact-able environmental features that can change the tide of battle. With 4 characters to choose from, the player decides the stats and ultimate abilities that are best suited to their personal play style to become the ultimate DodgeBrawl Champion. 

Compatible with controller only.
